description:
If trans women are women, why do we need the term “Cis-Female”? And if they are not women, why do we need the term “Cis-Female”? That is something the left cannot comprehend, which is why the woke City of Toronto intends to remove “male” and “female” from forms and replace it with “cis-male” and “cis-female”.

Adding the term “cis” in front of words is a way for the gender-bender bandwagon to justify their terms as if they are the normal ones. However, the fact that they demand the masses “affirm” their delusion at the expense of sanity proves otherwise.


The city of Toronto is planning to remove “Male” and “Female” from all forms and change it to “Cis-Male” and “Cis-Female”

“These changes need to be made in an emergency basis.”
title: Woke City Mulls Removing Terms “Male” And “Female” To Replace With “Cis-Male” And “Cis-Female"

description:

If you want to know the truth about America, ask a 10-year-old.

CNN asked several kids about politics and the group may have been one of the most insightful people they have interviewed this election.

CNN: What’s the first word that pops into you head when you hear the name Kamala Harris?

Child 1: Liar.

CNN: What’s the word that pops into you head when you hear the name Donald Trump?

Child 2: Pure evil.

CNN: Which one do you think is more selfish?
title: Watch: CNN Asks 10-Year-Olds About The Election And The Answers Are Better Than You Think
